verbs.description: [V: is] having 6 new college football playoff committee members a good thing there are a lot of new voices for the college football playoff selection committee six of the 13 members are serving for the first time scott stricklin sports columnist joe castiglione nick saban usc grapevine oklahoma ken hatfield rob mullens georgia tech arkansas chairman todd stansbury north texas rice texas kirby hocutt arizona bill hancock reporter football oregon director executive director representative ronnie lott joe castiglione athletic director alabama paola boivin florida clemson
